frameworkImplementations.description: React implementation of GreenWatch using hooks pattern for ViewModel consumption

components.name: Dashboard
components.purpose: Main dashboard view showing overview of all GreenWatch entities
components.pattern: useObservable hook with useEffect for lifecycle management

components.name: GreenhouseList
components.purpose: List view of all greenhouses with CRUD operations
components.pattern: useObservable hook for reactive state, command execution for operations

components.name: GreenhouseCard
components.purpose: Card component displaying individual greenhouse details
components.pattern: Props-based component receiving data from parent

components.name: SensorList
components.purpose: List view of sensors with filtering and CRUD operations
components.pattern: useObservable hook with command pattern for operations

components.name: SensorCard
components.purpose: Card component displaying individual sensor details

components.name: SensorReadingList
components.purpose: List view of sensor readings with time-series data

components.name: SensorReadingCard
components.purpose: Card component displaying sensor reading data with charts

components.name: ThresholdAlertList
components.purpose: List view of threshold alerts with management operations
components.pattern: useObservable hook for reactive alert management

components.name: ThresholdAlertCard
components.purpose: Card component displaying individual alert details

hooks.name: useObservable
hooks.purpose: Custom hook for subscribing to RxJS observables in React components
hooks.pattern: Manages subscription lifecycle with useEffect cleanup

keyPatterns.commands: Direct command execution via ViewModel instances

composables.pattern: Returns reactive ref that updates when observable emits

frameworkImplementations.description: Framework-free implementation of GreenWatch using EJS templates and direct DOM manipulation

views.name: Dashboard
views.pattern: EJS template rendered with state data

appModules.purpose: Application entry point, initializes ViewModels and app modules

appModules.purpose: Manages observable subscriptions and state updates

appModules.purpose: Manages DOM event listeners and command execution

appModules.name: ui
appModules.purpose: UI rendering utilities using EJS templates

keyPatterns.stateManagement: Manual state object with observable subscriptions
keyPatterns.commands: Direct command execution via ViewModel instances
keyPatterns.rendering: EJS templates with manual DOM updates

frameworkImplementations.description: Advanced React implementation showcasing MVVM with design system integration, authentication, and composite command patterns

components.name: Dashboard
components.purpose: Main dashboard view with design system integration
components.pattern: useObservable hook with design tokens and theming

components.name: GreenhouseList
components.purpose: List view of greenhouses with UI patterns integration

components.name: SensorList
components.purpose: List view of sensors with routing

components.name: ThresholdAlertList
components.purpose: List view of threshold alerts

components.name: CompositeCommandPanel
components.purpose: Demonstrates composite command pattern for batch operations

components.name: AuthGate
components.purpose: Authentication gate component for protected routes

components.name: AccountPanel
components.purpose: User account management panel

components.name: ThemeToggle
components.purpose: Theme switching component using design-core

providers.name: AuthProvider
providers.purpose: React Context provider for authentication state
providers.pattern: Context API with useObservable for global auth state

layout.name: Header
layout.purpose: Application header with navigation and auth status

keyPatterns.stateManagement: RxJS observables with React Context for global state
keyPatterns.uiPatterns: Integration with ui-patterns for composed behaviors

components.name: GreenhouseList

components.name: SensorList

components.name: SensorCard

components.purpose: List view of sensor readings

hooks.name: useObservable
hooks.purpose: Custom hook for subscribing to RxJS observables in React Native
hooks.pattern: Same pattern as React web, adapted for mobile

keyPatterns.note: This is an experimental implementation and may not be fully functional

authViewModel.note: Authentication-specific ViewModel, only used in React Integrated app

React.stateManagement: RxJS observables converted to React state

Vue.stateManagement: RxJS observables converted to Vue refs

Angular.stateManagement: Async pipe for automatic subscription management

VanillaJS.pattern: Direct subscriptions with manual DOM updates
VanillaJS.stateManagement: Manual state object with observable subscriptions

ReactIntegrated.stateManagement: RxJS observables with React Context for global state
ReactIntegrated.additionalFeatures: Design system integration, composite commands, authentication

ReactNative.stateManagement: RxJS observables converted to React state

Dashboard.purpose: Main dashboard showing all GreenWatch entities

GreenhouseList.purpose: List view of greenhouses with CRUD operations

SensorReadingList.purpose: List view of sensor readings with time-series data

keyInsights.frameworkIndependence: All 4 core GreenWatch ViewModels are successfully used across 7 different framework implementations, demonstrating true framework independence
keyInsights.consistentPatterns: Each framework adapts the same ViewModels using framework-specific patterns (hooks, composables, DI, decorators, direct subscriptions)
keyInsights.sharedBusinessLogic: Business logic in ViewModels is completely reused - only the View layer changes between frameworks
keyInsights.scalability: The pattern scales from simple (Vanilla JS) to complex (React Integrated with design system and auth)
keyInsights.crossPlatform: Same ViewModels work on web (React, Vue, Angular, Lit, Vanilla) and mobile (React Native)
